first_para: Roger Duncan Godsiff (born 28 June 1946) is a British Labour politician, who was the Member of Parliament for Birmingham Sparkbrook and Small Heath from 1992 to 2010, when he became Member of Parliament for Birmingham Hall Green.

full.extract: Roger Duncan Godsiff (born 28 June 1946) is a British Labour politician, who was the Member of Parliament for Birmingham Sparkbrook and Small Heath from 1992 to 2010, when he became Member of Parliament for Birmingham Hall Green.
full.title: Roger Godsiff
